  global $wpdb;
  if ( file_exists( WP_CONTENT_DIR . '/db.php' ) )
    require_once( WP_CONTENT_DIR . '/db.php' );
  else
    require_once( ABSPATH . WPINC . '/wp-db.php' );
}
